product_name: Marker Tour F12 EPF Randonee Bindings
long_description: Ski a fresh line every time with the Marker Tour F12 EPF randonee bindings. Start your day off riding lifts and once the pow is tracked out you can switch to tour mode to check out the sidecountry.
short_description: Ski a fresh line every time with the Marker Tour F12 EPF randonee bindings. Start your day off riding lifts and once the pow is tracked out you can switch to tour mode to check out the sidecountry.
